text: Antebellum, Latin for "before war", may refer to: ==United States history== * Antebellum South, the pre-American Civil War period in the Southern United States ** Antebellum Georgia ** Antebellum South Carolina ** Antebellum Virginia * Antebellum architecture ==Other uses== * Lady Antebellum, former name of American country music group Lady A ==Related pages== * * * History of the United States (1789â€“1849) * Status quo ante bellum, a Latin phrase meaning "the status before the war"
title: Antebellum
